title: Royal Ruby Pendant: A Timeless Thali Bottu
materials: Cubic Zirconia (CZ) simulating Diamonds. Features a rich Hyderabadi Polish for enhanced luster.
features: This exquisitely crafted pendant showcases a central oval-cut ruby, embraced by a floral arrangement of dazzling CZ diamonds. Delicate gold filigree adds an ethereal touch, while cascading gold ball drops lend movement and elegance. The design draws inspiration from traditional South Indian temple jewelry, offering a contemporary take on a classic Thali Bottu.
occasions: and traditional ceremonies like Seemantham (సీమంతం) and Gruhapravesam (గృహప్రవేశం). Also suitable for festive occasions like Sankranti (సంక్రాంతి) and Ugadi (ఉగాది).
description: This heirloom-quality Thali Bottu pendant beautifully blends tradition and sophistication. The vibrant ruby symbolizes love and prosperity, while the meticulously crafted design represents the rich cultural heritage of South India. It's a statement piece that adds a touch of regal elegance to any outfit and makes a cherished gift for generations to come.
